thread.title: Antoine De Lange
thread.title_full: Travelbird Beoordeeld door Antoine De Lange

author: Antoine De Lange
title: Antoine De Lange
text:
Hotel 'The Vulcan Lanzarote' is one of the leading hotels in the island
Very good situated on the sea and the Rubicon Port.
The standaard rooms are ok, but for the beautful view you better take 4 and 5 level.
Lanzarote is easy to visit with a hired car.
The Vulcan area natural park is amazing.
